outputs.output_descr:
The project is supporting the following activities: 
Output One: 1) a national policy on legal aid, including options for institutionalizing the system of public defenders and legal aid as a longer-term solution to improve access to justice for the poor, vulnerable and marginalised; 2) establishment of a national mechanism for victims and witness protection; 3)  capacity building support in the application of international human rights norms by courts, police, prosecutor's office, court decision enforcement agency; 4) implementation of international human rights conventions. 
Output Two: 1) Support functioning of legal aid centres; 2) build capacity for improved protection and services to victims of GBV; 3) monitoring of implementation of the National Human Rights Action Plan.

project_descr: The project aims to contribute to improved normative framework and capacity of duty bearers to provide legal protection and access to justice to the disadvantaged.
